documents.document: Time to get in to a freshly washed & made bed, listen to the Harry Potter audiobooks and pray for sleep.
It totally worked. But it's night time now and my mind is spiraling like it has every night for weeks. #TalkingAboutIt
I spent my day off anxious-cleaning my room and purging/organizing my closet + dressers as distraction & then went to yoga. #TalkingAboutIt
Because the universe decided I wasn't anxious enough, it's apparently going to snow 15-25cm the weekend before I start my new job. Cool.
@PhantomRat It was the actor, not the creator that said it but I'm still a little wary of the show now because of it.
@PhantomRat This is super delayed but I found the article I was talking about before if you're interested: https://t.co/QzXaEMcAHv.
@PhantomRat I think I saw somewhere that the creator said they "weren't that kind of show" when asked if they would pair them up for real 😑😑
@PhantomRat Yes! The Betty and Veronica stuff was super queer bait-y
I just got to 'Hitting the Fan' in my #TheGoodWife re-watch. Don't mind me, I'm just going to cry my way through the rest of season five.
I cannot tell them apart. I keep confusing myself re: which one is Dylan and which is Cole. Which was Zack and which was Cody.
I have been looking at pictures of Dylan and Cole Sprouse for the last twenty minutes and I think they might just be one person??
Correction: super into it. Needs more Jughead and less Ms. Grundy, but otherwise - it's great so far.
Some of this dialogue is incredibly cringe-y, but I think I'm in. #Riverdale
I can't believe the state of the world is so bleak that I'm watching #Scandal thinking, "Huh. I wish that had happened in real life."
@MollytheGhost Just watched you stab a bunch of balloons on your snapchat story & it was strangely cathartic haha. Hope you enjoyed it too!
@joyocracy Thank you!!
@FattyA123 Thank you!
@VanWritersFest Thank you so much!
So, I won 2nd place in the 2016 @VanWritersFest short story contest! 🎉 https://t.co/U3WPmBaJuP
The guy I had a crush on all through elementary school out here liking pro-Trump / anti-Obama posts on Facebook.
What the forking shirtballs just happened? #TheGoodPlace
Adventures in cleaning my room: a terrifying middle school art project + my journals from age 9 to 17. https://t.co/7iWYUGPhAk
I drove three hours this morning for a fifteen minute meeting... BUT! I officially have a new job 🎉🎉
My parents are watching Suits for the first time + it's making me realize I should have rage-quit the show 3 seasons before I actually did.
"When you’re a kid, optimism is overvalued; I often felt as if I were required to see the bright side even when there just wasn’t one."

I truly admire Lin-Manuel Miranda's dedication to being a #WestWing fanboy.
https://t.co/7QC2w6bXMi
@brittneyplz I don't know if it counts because it's technically a dorm but the room from zoey 101 + kerri/bridget's from 8 simple rules!
How many times will I yell "I'M SO SAD" at my TV as I watch the rest of the series? Over/under is at 50000x.

"MY PLAN IS I LOVE YOU."
I am distraught.
I'm re-watching #TheGoodWife rn and, knowing what happens in season 5, Eli deleting the voicemail is even more incredibly devastating.
I am now back in Vancouver, where it's -11, the roads are sheets of ice, and our furnace is broken. I already miss being warm.
@lemonsand yes, same. I love the idea of exploring new places and cultures but it's always such a stressful experience
@lemonsand but when you tell people you don't like to travel, they seem to equate that with you being boring...
@lemonsand extremely same. I find that I'm anxious and uncomfortable the majority of all my trips + it increases the further from home I am.
But, happy 2017 kids. May this year be one of hope, happiness and health.
Turns out, even on a beach, the countdown to the new year is severely anti climactic.
It's still 2016 here. Meanwhile, all of my friends back home are in 2017, sending me drunken snapchats. I think they're better off.
@MollytheGhost That's (basically) how I rang in 2016 - I really enjoyed it so I hope tonight is peaceful + relaxing for you! Happy New Year!
@dimpled_trash yes this is so great! I started journaling again in 2015 and honestly it has helped me so much
But I spent most of today in the ocean and I'll be ringing in 2017 on the beach surrounded by my extended family. So, bring it on.
2016 was awful. For the world, obviously, but also for me personally. Physically, emotionally. It sucked.
I thought starting A LITTLE LIFE on this trip was a good idea but I'm halfway through + extremely distraught so I may have been mistaken.
My body decided to have a total meltdown the day before going on vacation. Sore throat, fever, bone-deep exhaustion & anxiety out the wazoo.
@____alyssahead Thank you! The first leg is down. Two more to go.
@cozyteareads I binged Lovesick and Please Like Me recently and loved them!
I have to work all day (Boxing Day in retail...) and there is a very real possibility that I will cry at some point today.
I am traveling by myself tonight / tomorrow morning to meet the rest of my family & I have been having a 72hr long anxiety attack about it.
For the first year, maybe ever, I cannot wait for Christmas to be over.
@katespencer I love Tyler Hilton so much, and I usually find him so charming, but I cannot with this character.
Breakfast for dinner is a small joy, but a wonderful one.
@margeincharge I fell hard and fast for Pitch, Lovesick and Please Like Me this year.
It's 6:30am and I already need this day to be over.
I've finally caught up on #PleaseLikeMe + the latest episode, "Burrito Bowl" is absolutely devastating. This show is so good.
Ban all stores that force customers to use communal mirrors. Let us look at ourselves in unflattering clothing/light in peace.
Just purchased the #P4A2016 Digital Bundle to support an awesome charity campaign! Check out the perks and donate! https://t.co/7aowSq72la
#RenewPitch
If tonight's season finale was the last ever episode of #Pitch, I am going to be bitter and sad forever.
They've been nice, cozy hibernation days but with a strong undercurrent of anxiety and sadness.
And today, I watched all 2 seasons of #Lovesick and coloured for three hours.
But! That hasn't stopped me from trying. So, yesterday I slept 10hrs, took a bath and read two books.
The past week has been super rough for me, emotionally and mentally. My usual distraction tactics have not been helping. #talkingaboutit
Please, please let this be my last Christmas season working in retail.
@emerylord I like sincerity and unironic enthusiasm + dislike apathy
Also, the decision for the entire last season to only span a weekend will always be unfathomable to me.
Okay, I'm on season 9 and I completely forgot about the bizarrely racist episode in the middle of it. Skip.
Winter is my favourite season + I love snow, but I don't love that it renders my car useless or that it took 4x longer to get to work today.
@rachsyme I read all day & am now going to walk around a lake + look at Christmas light display w. my best friend. It's a rare good Sunday.
@margeincharge Yes... Is that not how it's pronounced?
@TVandDinners I love the show but that title card is terrible.
For the record: this is an incredibly high endorsement.
If anyone needs me, I'll be over here, incoherently screaming about #Pitch.
@margeincharge I started watching Grey's when I was 12 + would watch Desperate Housewives with my mom at 11 (ish)!
After a couple of days, I've decided that I enjoyed (maybe) 60% of #AYITL but ultimately, I would've been content to stick w. the s7 ending.
This, from @TheFienPrint, pretty much sums up how I felt re: Luke + Lorelai's relationship in the revival. https://t.co/8IoWJMhDUN
@esmewang Enjoy! I went to see a movie solo for the first time just last week (Arrival) and it was wonderful!
@ashawash Ahhh it looks awesome!!
I have some very complicated feelings about the revival, but the more I think about the ending + those last 4 words, the angrier I get.
@sammynickalls thank you!
It wasn't perfect, but it felt a little like coming home. #GilmoreGirls
✌🏻out internet - I'm logging off everything till tmr night b/c I'll be damned if I get spoiled for Gilmore Girls. See you on the flip side!
@myhairisblue thank you!!
@franhoepfner I use the daily moleskine planner because I find it helpful to write to do lists each day + it's a good size to carry around!
It is 2016 and I am about to listen to a new song featuring Ashanti and JaRule. For the next 3:35, the world is a beautiful place.
@myhairisblue I went for a walk in a park the other day when it was (miraculously) not raining + felt pretty good a… https://t.co/mQpdg67x9V
@____alyssahead I can't watch it until I get off work tomorrow at 5pm PST but then can we please discuss???
BUT! I have pizza + a pint of ice cream + the Gilmore Girls revival to look forward to after I escape the horrors of the mall. 🙏🏻
I work in retail and tomorrow is Black Friday. Please keep me in your thoughts.
Noah should never speak, obviously. But these male college students are the f--king worst.
None of the men on this show should ever be allowed to speak. #TheAffair
I've been awake since 5:30am. I drove 2.5 hours and had a job interview before going to work. I am falling asleep as I type this. Help.
@theames I'm 23 and I definitely remember my schedule!
I'm still mad about the series finale, but this rewatch is actually making me LESS mad. The show is definitely not as great as I remembered.
The only thing that remains wonderful about the show is Marshall + Lily's relationship.
All the things I found charming the 1st time around (Ted+Robin, the group banter, Barney's entire personality) are now borderline repulsive.
The early seasons are awful. Sexist, slut-shamey, fatphobic, transphobic and racist.
I've been rewatching 'How I Met Your Mother' and MAN does this show not hold up. It only began in 2005, but it feels so dated.
My Korean barbecue dinner was so spicy I had to take three breaks while eating it and legitimately cried. But it was delicious.
HOLY F--K, I cannot believe they just did that. #HTGAWM
@dimpled_trash uM how am i not already friends with you on snapchat? dm name your username?
@ashawash I'm very excited for you!
